title: Silent Hill - Pyramid Head Tryndamere Reference Skin
body:
http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130405214831/playstationallstarsfanfictionroyale/images/5/51/PYramid_Head.png

I like nightmare tryndamere but I'm dying for a Pyramid Head Skin D: I can picture the spark effects on his sword as he runs, similar to rammus and well c'mon you get the point! These two are so similar!! and it would be so cool to have an epic skin like this!

Could call it butcher tryndamere or something lol

replies.body: Nightmare Tryndamere was actually inspired by Pyramid Head. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cB53m78o,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-29T23:34:41.178+0000)
>
> Nightmare Tryndamere was actually inspired by Pyramid Head. :]

I KNEW IT. Sorry for caps but it's also reminds me of this spoof video by DanteAxe https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyXglTa9BkQ

I don't know how much more spot on you want them to be bro.
They could go back, give King Rammus some horns and fire, call it Bowser, give Nightmare Trynd a giant pyramid head and call him Pyramid Head... is that what you want?
